entry.title: Derby Originals Universal Vented Neoprene Non-Slip English Saddle Pad - Lightweight Breathable Design - Prevents Tack Slippage and Shifting while Riding
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: English Saddle Pads
Price: 12.99

Put an end to saddle slippage with this non-slip pure neoprene rubber pad. The neoprene rubber helps to grip your tack and assists in keeping everything securely in place. To use this non-slip pad, simply place it directly on your horse's back in the location where you would like the saddle to sit, then layer your saddle pad and other tack on top. This pad stays completely concealed while keeping all your tack in the perfect position to prevent any discomfort for both you and your horse. This pad is made from a lightweight neoprene rubber that is incredibly lightweight, can be easily cut to size so you can adjust the pad for your own personalized fit, and features ventilation holes to ensure airflow and increase comfort. Our pads are the best-selling non-slip pads on the market and are favored by professional horsemen!

 

Features

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE’S COMFORT IN MIND - tack slippage can cause irritation, soreness, and even become dangerous for both horse and rider. With our comfortable, soft, breathable pure neoprene non-slip saddle pad, tack slippage will become a thing of the past!

PREVENTS TACK MOVEMENT AND SLIPPAGE - our neoprene rubber pad grips your tack and holds it in place, preventing saddle pads, bareback pads, saddles, or another tack from shifting when you are riding.

UNIVERSAL FIT - this no-slip pad measures 17.5” by 21.5” to accommodate larger saddle pads and saddles, but can also be cut to size using a sharp knife or pair of scissors to fit smaller and contoured saddle pads or half pads. 

VENTILATED STAY-COOL DESIGN - our premium no-slip pad features a ventilated and breathable design that helps prevent excess sweating and keep your horse cool while it is in use.

LIGHTWEIGHT NON-BULKY DESIGN - this saddle pad is made from 3/16” neoprene that is thin enough to not add bulk or change the fit of your tack. Our ultra-thin non-slip pads are discreet and will not create bulging under your tack.

Derby Originals Traditional Diamond Quilted White Dressage Saddle Pad

          Enjoy your rides with this white classic diamond quilted Dressage saddle pad. Utilize the velcro billet keepers and the girth loops that help prevent shifting and any slipping while riding. This Dressage saddle pad is perfect for a daily schooling saddle pad, yet nice for showing as well. The dimensions of this English saddle pad are 24” across, and the drop length from the spine is 21” to the end of the pad. This product is compatible with most Dressage saddles for multi-purpose use at any equestrian event.

TRADITIONAL LOOK - featuring a classic diamond-quilted patterned uniformed throughout the pad. This is great Dressage schooling and show pad.

GENEROUSLY SIZED - the dimensions of this English saddle pad make for a great fit. The spine is 24” across, and the drop length from the spine is 21” to the end of the pad.

PREVENTS SHIFTING - velcro billet keepers and girth loops secure the pad to prevent the saddle pad from shifting underneath the tack.

The half fleece lined underside is coupled with high-density foam quilting for the perfect amount of padding and breathability. SIZE - 25” x 22” fits most Dressage and Australian Saddles.

TRADITIONAL LOOK - featuring a classic diamond quilted patterned uniformed throughout the pad. This is great Dressage schooling and show pad.

VELCRO CLOSE POCKETS - this saddle pad features two 8” x 8” x 1.2” pockets on either side of the pad for safe storage of personal items.

HALF FLEECE LINED UNDERSIDE - gives this saddle pad the perfect amount of padding with the added high-density foam for a comfortable breathable trail ride.

entry.title: Derby Originals Extra Comfort All Purpose English Saddle Pad with Removable Memory Foam
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: English Saddle Pads
Price: 45.99

Derby Originals Extra Comfort All Purpose English Saddle Pad with Removable Memory Foam

This all purpose saddle pad is designed to enable you to create a customized 
fit for your horse and tack equipment. The pockets are filled with removable memory foam to adjust to the shape of your tack and your horses back, providing comfort in sensitive areas. This pad is ideal for horses returning to work after a long period of rest and those who have sensitive areas that lie underneath the saddle. Equestrians can also use this for daily riding!

Key Features & Item Specifications:

  • Designed with circle quilted, heavy duty soft cotton twill fabric.
  • Two Velcro close pockets with removable memory foam inserts.
  • Velcro billet keepers and girth loops to prevent any tack from shifting.
  • Fits most all purpose and forward flap saddles.
  • Breathable spine to ensure air flow.
  • Ideal for horses returning to work after a long break, those with sensitive areas that lie under the saddle, and for daily riding.
  • Sizing: 
    • Spine Length: 23"
    • Drop Length: 20"
    • Width at widest point: 26"
 

Derby Originals Cotton Comfort All Purpose Saddle Pad.

Why Choose Derby?

Derby Originals caters to every equestrians needs by providing creative, innovative, and original equine products. Derby’s line of English saddle pads are meticulously tested and tried by elite equestrians to ensure they stand up to and meet every demand of both horse and rider. Our goal is to make certain that horse and rider are able to achieve ultimate comfort so that every riding session is a fantastic experience.

  • Derby Originals English saddle pads cater to the needs of every equestrian across all disciplines including every day riders and high end competitors.

Derby Originals Cotton Comfort All Purpose Saddle Pad

Embrace an Exceptional Fit

Provide your horse with soothing comfort with Derby Originals innovative all purpose English saddle pad with removable memory foam inserts. Designed with horse in mind, this pad will provide ultimate comfort in sensitive areas along the back and wither areas. This pad is ideal for horses returning to work after long periods of rest, those working to develop top line muscles, those with sensitive or 'cold' backs, and for everyday riding.

  • State of the art, shock absorbing memory foam.
  • Velcro billet keepers and girth loops.
  • Soft, durable, circle quilted pattern.
  • Velcro close pockets to hold memory foam for easy removal and adjustment.
  • Breathable spine.
View larger

Shock Absorbing Memory Foam

This pad features two removable memory foam inserts engineered to correct common complications that arise with traditional saddle pads. The sponge like characteristics of the memory foam form to the shape of the tack and horses back to provide the perfect amount of cushion where needed. Any impact and shock that occurs during riding is absorbed through the memory foam creating a smooth ride for both horse and rider.

Embrace an Exceptional Fit

This pad features with key design elements to ensure an exceptional fit. These features include Velcro billet keepers and girth loops to prevent the saddle pad from slipping underneath the tack, soft brushed cotton underside to provide gentle contact with the horse back, breathable spine to provide proper air flow, and cotton, circle quilted pattern material to ensure the pad can stand up to daily use.

Wide Array of Colors for Every Rider Prefence

This saddle pad not only delivers an exceptional fit, but style as well. Choose from one of our three colors to fit your style preferences. Available in aqua blue, black and white. New colors to come in fall of 2018!

Derby Originals All Purpose English Saddle Pad with Pockets

Time to Hit the Trails!

The Derby Originals All Purpose English Saddle Pad with Pockets is designed with the avid trail rider in mind. With its unique features, both horse and rider will be comfortable as you ride through your favorite scenic trail route. Our pad features two 8"x8"x1.2" quilted, Velcro-close pockets for storage of items you may need along with your ride such as snacks, treats, and first aid supplies. The Velcro closures on these pockets allow for quick access to your items and reduce the risk of injury from traditional metal or zipper closures. Utilize the Velcro billet keepers and girth loops to keep your saddle pad from shifting underneath your tack. The underside of the pad is half fleece lined for just the right amount of padding. This saddle pad is generously sized and will fit all purpose, jumping and close contact saddles.

Pocket for Trail Riding

The velcro closures on these pockets allow for quick access to your items and reduces the risk of injury from traditional metal or zipper closures.

Unique 8" x 8" x 1.2" Pockets

This saddle pad features an 8" x 8" x 1.2" pocket on either side of the pad for storage of items you may want to bring with you during long, scenic trail rides with your horse. The Velcro closure allows for quick retrieval of supplies while reducing the risk of injury from typical metal and zipper closures.

Perfect Fit

This pad was engineered with half fleece lining on the underside to keep your horse comfortable yet cool. The half fleece provides necessary padding to keep your horse comfortable along long adventures, yet the smaller portion prevents your horse from becoming overheated.

Adored by all Equestrians

Many equestrians use this pad for everyday riding as well as trail riding. This pad is available in four classic colors: white, navy, green and black. They also feature gold piping on the outer edge for a touch of flare.

Derby Originals Fleece Lined Quilted Contour Eventing English Correction Half Pad

One of Derby Originals best selling English half pads. Use this contour half pad to provide cushion between your horse and saddle to prevent any unwanted pinching or pressure when riding. This pad features full rolled fleece edges, a soft fleece lined underside, contour shape, diamond quilted pattern, and Velcro billet keepers to ensure a perfect fit. The cotton material and innovative spine design allows for excellent circulation and extra padding to making riding more comfortable for your horse. Great to use if you have a horse that is hard to fit for a saddle such as a high withered OTTB or a horse that is still developing.

Key Features & Item Specifications

IMPROVE YOUR SADDLE FIT - our classic fleece lined half pad is perfect for creating a better fit with a saddle that would otherwise be slightly too wide, by filling in that space that could otherwise cause uneven pressure.

IMPROVES CIRCULATION AND REDUCES STRAIN - the contoured, ergonomic design of this half pad helps to maintain even pressure across the horse’s spine and back and improve circulation while reducing harmful pressure on the spine and withers that could cause pain and back issues.

CONTOURED DESIGN - this half pad has a contoured shape and contoured spine and wither design so that it can comfortably fit horses with narrow backs or high withers. This contoured design is ergonomic and conforms to your horse’s back for the most comfortable ride possible.

SIZING - the dimensions of this saddle pad are 21” across the spine and a 12” drop length towards the front with an 8” drop length in the back.

entry.summary:

Type: English Saddle Pads
Price: 27.95

This generously sized pad is designed for trail riding with All Purpose, Jumping and Close Contact Saddles. Half fleece lining for the right amount of padding without being too hot for long rides.

*This saddle pad is on closeout because this item has yellow discoloration. This varies from saddle pad to saddle pad. The photo is only to illustrate what it might look like. This item is not eligible for returns.

entry.title: Derby Originals Traditional Dressage Saddle Pad Diamond Quilted with Gold Rope Lining
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: English Saddle Pads
Price: 32.95

Derby Originals Traditional Dressage Saddle Pad Diamond Quilted with Gold Rope Lining

Classic diamond quilted Dressage saddle pad with a touch of elegance added by a silk gold rope trim edging the pad. This English pad comes in Dressage style colors of solid navy blue, and solid black. Utilize the velcro billet keepers and the girth loops that help prevent shifting and any slipping while riding. This Dressage saddle pad is perfect for a daily schooling saddle pad, yet nice for showing as well. The dimensions of this English saddle pad are 22” across, and the drop length from the spine is 28” to the end of the pad. This product is compatible with most Dressage saddles for multi-purpose use at any equestrian event.

Key Features & Item Specifications

TRADITIONAL LOOK - featuring a classic diamond quilted patterned uniformed throughout the pad. This is great Dressage schooling and show pad.

GOLD ROPE TRIM - an elegant trim of silky gold rope is featured around the edge of the pad for an added touch of flair to this English saddle pad.

MULTIPLE COLORS AVAILABLE - this saddle pad comes in Dressage style colors of solid navy blue, and solid black.

GENEROUSLY SIZED - the dimensions of this English saddle pad make for a great fit. The spine is 22” across, and the drop length from the spine is 28” to the end of the pad.

PREVENTS SHIFTING - velcro billet keepers and girth loops secure the pad to prevent the saddle pad from shifting underneath the tack.

entry.title: Derby Originals Fleece Padded Contour All Purpose English Saddle Pad
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: English Saddle Pads
Price: 44.99

Derby Originals Fleece Padded Contour All Purpose English Saddle Pad

 Designed to look and function just like your high end show pads & be suitable as a daily schooling pad. Made by Derby Originals, this pad features heavy duty cotton twill quilted fabric, Velcro billet keepers, girth loops, soft washable synthetic fleece lining on the underside of the saddle pad, and 2 3/4" thick fleece trim around the contoured edge of the saddle pad. 

 

Key Features & Item Specifications

CLASSIC LOOK - this contour all purpose English saddle pad has a classic diamond quilted design completed with a comfortable fleece lining.

QUALITY DESIGN - made with excellent heavy duty cotton twill quilted fabric and synthetic, washable fleece.

PREVENTS SHIFTING - velcro billet keepers and girth loops secure the pad to prevent the saddle pad from shifting underneath the tack.

ALL PURPOSE - not just for trails! This saddle pad is adored by all equestrians as a daily schooling pad as well. Great for everyday use!

GENEROUSLY SIZED - the dimensions of this English saddle pad make for a great fit. The spine is 22” across, and the drop length from the spine is 21” to the end of the pad. The fleece trim around the contoured edge is 2 ¾”. Fits most saddles up to size 18”.
